attributes.action: Make the Computers for Pupils Initiative Fair
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Free laptops for children from poor homes sounds very noble.

How about the children who aren't quite poor enough, whose parents work long and hard to feed and provide for their children.

This initiative should provide for all or none, this initiative is discriminatory.

The spongers of this nation get away with everything and here is yet another sad example of a failing government trying to win votes.

Please join my petition to win a fair deal for all children, whatever their background.
